A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow! They knocked it out of the park with this one an adrenaline rush from start to finish. So good to see a return to well written core characters in this new saga. Mark Hamill and Adam Driver really stand out. Story wise I'm sure the fans are going to be divided but I think any criticism about story is subjective at the end of the day. Whether or not you like some of the choices made story wise there is no denying it's beautifully crafted popcorn cinema full of great performances.
